summary.span: 以一个或多个只读、只进结果集的形式获取一个或多个 对象的内容。

span.span: The obtains the contents of one or more objects in the form of one or more read-only, forward-only result sets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的工作方式与任何其他数据读取器（如 ）非常相似，不同之处在于 用于遍历 中的行。The works much like any other data reader, such as the , except that the provides for iterating over rows in a . 换句话说，它可用于循环访问缓存中的行。In other words, it provides for iterating over rows in a cache. 在 处于活动状态时，可以修改缓存的数据，并且读取器将自动保持其位置。The cached data can be modified while the is active, and the reader automatically maintains its position. 在从 创建 时，生成的 对象将包含一个结果集，该结果集的数据与创建它的 的数据相同，但任何已标记为已删除的行除外。When you create a from a , the resulting object contains one result set with the same data as the from which it was created, except for any rows that have been marked as deleted. 列按与原始 相同的顺序显示。The columns appear in the same order as in the original . 返回的结果的结构在架构和数据上与原始 完全相同。The structure of the returned result is identical in schema and data to the original . 如果 包含多个表，则通过调用 对象的 方法创建的 包含多个结果集。A that was created by calling the method of a object contains multiple result sets if the contains more than one table. 结果与 对象的 中 对象的序列相同。The results are in the same sequence as the objects in the of the object. 返回的结果集仅包含每个 的当前版本;将跳过标记为删除的行。The returned result set contains only the current version of each ; rows that are marked for deletion are skipped. `DataTableReader` 提供稳定的迭代器;也就是说，如果在迭代期间修改了基础集合的大小，则 `DataTableReader` 的内容不会失效。The `DataTableReader` provides a stable iterator; that is, the contents of the `DataTableReader` are not invalidated if the size of the underlying collection is modified during iteration. 例如，如果在迭代期间删除或删除了 集合中的一个或多个行，则将对 `DataTableReader` 中的当前位置进行相应维护，而不会使迭代器失效。For example, if one or more rows in the collection are deleted or removed during iteration, the current position within the `DataTableReader` is maintained appropriately and it does not invalidate the iterator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果必须基于特定 中的所有或部分表创建 ，请调用 `DataSet`的 方法。If you must create a based on all or a subset of the tables within a specific , call the `DataSet`'s method. 如果要基于一组不相关的 `DataTable` 实例创建新的 实例，请使用此构造函数。If you want to create a new instance based on a group of `DataTable` instances that are not otherwise related, use this constructor. 你还可以利用此构造函数在 `DataTableReader`中重新排列 `DataTables` 的顺序（如果它们在其源 `DataSet` 内的排序不满足你的需求）。You can also take advantage of this constructor to rearrange the ordering of the `DataTables` within the `DataTableReader`, if their ordering within their source `DataSet` does not meet your needs. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，TestConstructor 方法创建两个 实例。In the following example, the TestConstructor method creates two instances. 为了演示 类的此构造函数，该示例基于包含两个 `DataTables`的数组创建新 `DataTableReader`，并执行一个简单的操作，将前几列中的内容打印到控制台窗口。In order to demonstrate this constructor for the class, the sample creates a new `DataTableReader` based on an array that contains the two `DataTables`, and performs a simple operation, printing the contents from the first few columns to the console window. 若要测试此应用程序，请创建新的控制台应用程序，并将示例代码粘贴到新创建的文件中。In order to test this application, create a new Console application, and paste the sample code into the newly created file. remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetBytes` 返回字段中的可用字节数。`GetBytes` returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多数情况下，这是字段的准确长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，如果已使用 `GetBytes` 从字段获取字节，则返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 例如，当 将大型数据结构读入缓冲区时，可能会出现这种情况。This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer 如果传递的缓冲区 `null` （`Nothing` 在 Visual Basic 中），`GetBytes` 将以字节为单位返回整个字段的长度，而不是基于 buffer offset 参数的剩余大小。If you pass a buffer that is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), `GetBytes` returns the length of the entire field in bytes, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不执行任何转换;因此，检索的数据必须已经是字节数组或强制到字节数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array or coercible to a byte array. ## Examples 下面的示例基于 AdventureWorks 示例数据库中的数据创建 ，并将检索到的每个图像保存到 C：\ 的单独文件中folder.The following example creates a based on data in the AdventureWorks sample database, and saves each image retrieved to a separate file in the C:\ folder. 若要测试此应用程序，请创建新的控制台应用程序，引用 System.web 程序集，并将示例代码粘贴到新创建的文件中。In order to test this application, create a new Console application, reference the System.Drawing.dll assembly, and paste the sample code into the newly created file. remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetChars` 返回字段中的可用字符数。`GetChars` returns the number of available characters in the field. 大多数情况下，这是字段的准确长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，如果 `GetChars` 已用于从字段获取字符，则返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 如果到达了字段的末尾，则读取的实际字符数可以小于请求的长度。The actual number of characters read can be less than the requested length, if the end of the field is reached. 如果传递的缓冲区为 null （`Nothing` 在 Visual Basic 中），`GetChars` 将返回整个字段的长度（字符），而不是基于缓冲区 offset 参数的剩余大小。If you pass a buffer that is null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), `GetChars` returns the length of the entire field in characters, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不执行任何转换;因此，要检索的数据必须已是字符数组或强制为字符数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data to be retrieved must already be a character array or coercible to a character array. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `GetChars` 方法。The following example demonstrates the `GetChars` method. `TestGetChars` 方法应向传递的是包含两个数据列的 `DataTableReader`：第一列中的文件名和第二列中的字符数组。The `TestGetChars` method expects to be passed a `DataTableReader` filled with two columns of data: a file name in the first column, and an array of characters in the second. 此外，`TestGetChars` 使你可以指定要在从 `DataTableReader`中的字符数组中读取数据时使用的缓冲区大小。In addition, `TestGetChars` lets you specify the buffer size to be used as it reads the data from the character array in the `DataTableReader`. `TestGetChars` 使用 `DataTableReader` 的第一列中提供的数据作为文件名，来创建与 `DataTableReader`中的每个数据行对应的文件。`TestGetChars` creates a file corresponding to each row of data in the `DataTableReader`, using the supplied data in the first column of the `DataTableReader` as the file name. 此过程演示如何使用 `GetChars` 方法将 `DataTable` 中存储的数据作为字符数组进行读取。This procedure demonstrates the use of the `GetChars` method reading data that was stored in the `DataTable` as a character array. 任何其他类型的数据都会导致 `GetChars` 方法引发 `InvalidCastException`。Any other type of data causes the `GetChars` method to throw an `InvalidCastException`. summary.span: 返回一个可用于循环访问项集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the item collection.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它代表项集合。

span.span: An object that represents the item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器仅允许读取 中的数据。Enumerators only allow for reading the data in the . 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 首先，枚举器位于集合中第一个元素之前。At first, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置，调用 会引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 `MoveNext` 的值之前，必须调用 `Current` 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call `MoveNext` to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of `Current`. `Current` 返回 ，并返回相同的对象，直到调用 或 。`Current` returns a , and returns the same object until either or is called. `MoveNext` 将 `Current` 设置为下一个元素。`MoveNext` sets `Current` to the next element. 在集合的末尾之后，枚举数将定位在集合中最后一个元素的后面，并且调用 `MoveNext` 将返回 false。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling `MoveNext` returns false. 如果对的最后一个调用 `MoveNext` 返回 `false`，则调用 `Current` 将引发异常。If the last call to `MoveNext` returned `false`, calling `Current` throws an exception. 此外，由于 提供对其数据的只进访问权限，因此调用 IEnumerator 的 方法将引发一个 。In addition, because the provides forward-only access to its data, calling the method of the IEnumerator throws a . 提供稳定的枚举器。The provides a stable enumerator. 这意味着，即使基础数据中发生行删除或添加，对 的调用返回的枚举数仍有效。This means that even if row deletions or additions occur within the underlying data, the enumerator returned by a call to is still valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. 这包括枚举器处于活动状态时从基础 删除行时枚举器的行为。This includes the behavior of the enumerator when rows are deleted from the underlying while the enumerator is active. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator/VB/source.vb#1)] 此过程会在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：The procedure displays the following text in the Console window: ``` Peter Mary Russ ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类提供的大多数方法都必须提供序号列号，因此，在给定列名称的情况下，可以使用 `GetOrdinal` 方法检索列号。Because most of the methods provided by the class must be provided with an ordinal column number, you can use the `GetOrdinal` method to retrieve the column number, given the name of the column. `GetOrdinal` 首先执行区分大小写的查找。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，将进行第二个不区分大小写的搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 如果找不到列号，则会引发 `IndexOutOfRangeException`。If the column number is not found an `IndexOutOfRangeException` is thrown. `GetOrdinal` 不区分假名宽度。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 因为基于序号的查找比命名查找更高效，因此在循环内调用 `GetOrdinal` 效率低下。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 通过调用 `GetOrdinal` 一次，并将结果分配给整数变量以便在循环中使用，从而节省时间Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop ## Examples 如果只有一个列名，在这种情况下，列名称是用户提供的，并且必须从该列中检索信息，则可以使用如下所示的过程来提取所需的信息。If you have only a column name, in which case the column name is user supplied, and you must retrieve information from the column, you can use a procedure like the following to extract the required information. 在此示例中，该过程接受列名，并为 中的当前行返回列中包含的数据：In this example, the procedure accepts a column name and returns the data that is contained within that column for the current row in the : [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

type. 如果列的数据类型不同于行的数据类型，则此值 。If the data type of the column varies from row to row, this value is . 此列不能包含 NULL 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果列的数据类型是 并且其 |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|对于每个列 `false`。`false`, for every column.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`： 中没有两行可在此列中具有相同的值。`true`: No two rows in the can have the same value in this column. 如果列本身表示键，或者存在仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 类型的约束，则 `IsUnique` 保证为 true。`IsUnique` is guaranteed to be true if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`：列可以包含 `DataTable`中的重复值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the `DataTable`. 此列的默认值为 `false`。The default of this column is `false`.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`：列是一组列中的一列，这些列一起使用，以唯一标识 remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，此方法提供了一种有效的方法来检索所有列，而不是单独检索每个列。For most applications, this method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 如果您的目的是从 中的某一行检索所有列值，则 `GetValues` 方法提供最有效的解决方案。If your intent is to retrieve all the column values from a row within the , the `GetValues` method provides the most efficient solution. 可以传递一个 数组，该数组包含的列数少于所产生行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 只有 `Object` 数组可以容纳的数据量才会复制到数组中。Only the amount of data the `Object` array can hold is copied to the array. 你还可以传递一个其长度大于结果行中包含的列数的 `Object` 数组，在这种情况下，其他数组元素将在方法调用中保持不变。You can also pass an `Object` array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row, in which case the additional array elements remains unchanged by the method call. 此方法将 `DBNull` 放置在输出数组中，以查找 null 列。This method places `DBNull` in the output array for null columns. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用大小正确的数组从提供的 中读取当前行中的所有值。The following example demonstrates using an array that is the correct size, to read all values from the current row in the supplied . 此外，该示例还演示了如何使用大小固定的数组，该数组可以小于或大于可用列数。In addition, the sample demonstrates using a fixed-sized array that could be either smaller or larger than the number of available columns. summary.span: 使 前进到下一个结果集（如果有）。

span.span: Advances the to the next result set, if any.

returns.span: 如果有另一个结果集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there was another result set; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于处理多个结果，可以通过在包含两个或更多个表的 上创建 ，或在包含两个或多个 实例的数组上创建来生成这些结果。Used to process multiple results that can be generated by creating a over a that contains two or more tables, or an array that contains two or more instances. 新 将定位在第一个结果上。A new is positioned on the first result. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，TestConstructor 方法创建两个 实例。In the following example, the TestConstructor method creates two instances. 为了演示 类的此构造函数，该示例基于包含两个 `DataTables`的数组创建新 `DataTableReader`，并执行一个简单的操作，将前几列中的内容打印到控制台窗口。In order to demonstrate this constructor for the class, the sample creates a new `DataTableReader` based on an array that contains the two `DataTables`, and performs a simple operation, printing the contents from the first few columns to the console window. 若要测试此应用程序，请创建新的控制台应用程序，并将示例代码粘贴到新创建的文件中。In order to test this application, create a new Console application, and paste the sample code into the newly created file. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableReader.NextResult#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.NextResult/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableReader.NextResult#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.NextResult/VB/source.vb#1)] 控制台窗口将显示以下结果：The Console window displays the following results: ``` 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ 1 Wireless Network Card 2 Hard Drive 3 Monitor 4 CPU ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认位置在第一条记录之前。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，必须调用 `Read` 才能开始访问任何数据。Therefore, you must call `Read` to start accessing any data. ## Examples PrintColumns 过程循环遍历 中的所有行，并在控制台窗口中显示每个列的内容。The PrintColumns procedure loops through all the rows in the , displaying the contents of each column in the Console window.
